alert.note: Alert for Baldwin Central; Baldwin Coastal; Baldwin Inland; Mobile Central; Mobile Coastal; Mobile Inland (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 18 at 9:31AM CDT by NWS Mobile
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southern Mobile and western Baldwin Counties through 1015 AM CDT... At 931 AM CDT, National Weather Service doppler radar indicated strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 3 miles west of Tillmans Corner to 7 miles southwest of Petit Bois Island. Movement was northeast at 65 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Midtown Mobile, Prichard, Daphne, Tillmans Corner, Fairhope, Saraland, Bay Minette, Theodore, Chickasaw, Spanish Fort, Grand Bay, Bayou La Batre, Point Clear, Dauphin Island, Stapleton, I65 And I165, Coden, Mobile Regional Airport, I65 And AL 225 and I65 And AL 158. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. These storms may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 1000 AM CDT for southwestern Alabama. A Tornado Watch also remains in effect until 200 PM CDT for southwestern Alabama.
